description.doujinshi: Self-published or self-distributed hentai manga or pornographic comic involving recognizable characters or mascots from other anime, manga or video games.
description.manga: Officially published pornographic comic, typically featuring original content.
description.artistCg: Artwork sets without panels, often made digitally, typically in full color.
description.lightNovel: High-quality scanned images of light novels.

description.questionable: Containing non-genital nudity, sexually suggestive acts, or something that is not generically considered pornographic.
description.explicit: Containing exposed genitals, openly and unambiguously portrayed sex acts, or visible sexual fluids.
